titles.title: A resolution raising awareness of modern slavery.
A resolution raising awareness of modern slavery.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends each individual who supported the END IT movement on February 23, 2017.
Notes the dedication of individuals, organizations, and governments to end modern slavery.
Calls for international action to bring an end to modern slavery.
